index.userAlert: We'll be publishing our first texts soon. {0} for an account if you want to be notified.
index.introBlurb: Welcome to the CJHNT research platform! All of our texts, both the commentaries produced in the project and the early Jewish texts that they depend on, will be published here. We will also have advanced search functionality to allow you to do your own research on our corpus. To use the platform you will need to {0}. During the registration process you can also sign up to receive updates about new texts and new functionality.

auth.sendMeUpdates: Send me updates about the project
auth.onlyProject: This page is only available to project members.
auth.onlyRegistered: This page is only available to registered users.
auth.updatesOff: You will no longer receive project status updates.
auth.updatesOn: You will now receive project status updates.
auth.weakPasswordAlert: This password is weak. Please make it stronger.

comptext.mustLogin: Only registered users have access to our texts. Please either log in or sign up to proceed.

qumranZeichenerklärung.title: Sigla
qumranZeichenerklärung.row2: gap in the text of an indeterminate length
qumranZeichenerklärung.row6: corrected in the manuscript by a scribe to א
qumranZeichenerklärung.row7: secondarily inserted in the manuscript by a scribe
qumranZeichenerklärung.row9: remains of character that cannot be clearly interpreted
qumranZeichenerklärung.row12: variant inserted by a scribe above a character
qumranZeichenerklärung.row15: modern alternative reading of a letter
qumranZeichenerklärung.row16: modern alternative reading of a word
qumranZeichenerklärung.row17: phonemic representation of a base form
qumranZeichenerklärung.row25: marks a lemma in the lemma list as a reference to another lemma. Clicking on such a lemma will load the article of the referenced lemma. Lemmas with an '*' may either be a different spelling of the main lemma, part of a compound name, or indicate a lemma that has no article of its own due to lack of evidence, but is a subject of discussion in the lemma to which it is linked.
